comments.body: As per https://github.com/andywer/leakage#result-object, this needs to be `HeapDiff[]` and you can add import to node-memwatch to get the memwatch.HeapDiff

More or less... If you look into its [dependencies](https://www.npmjs.com/package/leakage) you will it uses the module from the airbnb npm namespace.

They both have the same interface, but I was not sure if I should take the one you figured out. I am going to change it like you mentioned, now...

In addition I figured out that the property `heapDiffs` does [not have the type `HeapDiff`](https://github.com/andywer/leakage/blob/master/lib/index.js#L50). It [has the type `HeapDiffInformation`](https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/blob/master/types/node-memwatch/index.d.ts#L58). Unfortunately this is not an exported interface.

What should I do now?
Ok lets keep this any and anybody wanting to make this better can fix it.
